A custom ggplot2 theme for Epiverse-TRACE packages and projects

Source: R/theme_trace.R
theme_trace.Rd

A custom ggplot2 theme for Epiverse-TRACE packages and projects

theme_trace()

Value

A ggplot2

theme object

Examples

library(ggplot2)
showtext::showtext_auto()

ggplot(mtcars, aes(wt, mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Fuel economy declines as weight increases") +
  theme_trace()
